1487570.name: Far North Survival
1487570.description:
FAR NORTH SURVIVAL is an open-world survival game set in the unique setting of a vast ice-bound area beyond the Arctic Circle.

Left alone in the ice desert, trying to survive with a little equipment you have, as a company having only faithful sled dogs, the player is set on a journey that will change both body and soul. You will have to build shelter, fix your equipment, and hunt for food, using both modern rifles and traditional Inuit hunting tools. The biggest enemy is not hunger though, it’s the weather. You will need to keep yourself warm and healthy, but even more importantly, you will need to take care of your sled dogs, keeping them fit and eaten.

SURVIVAL SIMULATOR
  • survive hunger and cold weather
  • build shelter and keep yourself warm
  • hunt for food, skin and gut the game
  • fix equipment, treat injured dogs

SACRED GHOST WORLD
The player explores not only the visible and real-world but also contacts the world of ghosts, based on traditional beliefs of indigenous people of the Arctic Circle.

BEYOND THE ARCTIC CIRCLE
Breathtaking ice deserts, snowy mountains, deep blue sea, beautiful but deadly.
  • dynamic weather
  • beautiful landscapes
  • the simulated natural behavior of animals

UNIQUE FEATURES
  • Setting: ice desert beyond The Arctic Circle
  • Modern and traditional hunting tools
  • Deadly weather and other aspects of a dynamic environment
  • Shelter building
  • Interaction with sled dogs
  • Spiritual discovery in the world of ghosts
1487570.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 土耳其语
